RevisionEvent.Note: DMSP Observatory: Update obsolete www.wmo-sat.info URL. Metadata submitted by J.M. Weygand on 2022-01-28, reviewed by LFB

ResourceHeader.Description: Defense Meteorological Satellite Program, DMSP-S20 20th flight unit of the DMSP Block 5D series, 6th (last) of the Block 5D-3 series. Main missions: cloud imagery and microwave imaging/temperature/humidity sounding. Substantial contribution to Space weather.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: DMSP Data Manager, NOAA National Environmental Satellite, Data, and Information Service, NESDIS
